pullRequest.title: Add Time condition to Conditional Logger
pullRequest.bodyText: Add Timeout logger for CB open method.

nodes.bodyText: What is the difference between RequestMetrics

I am not sure, if it is good idea, store all messages (strings) and AtomicInteger.
I have concerns regarding of memory usage of this class, bc of all logs which will be never deleted.

Not sure about AtomicLong usage here.
You don't change variable inside it, you recreating and replacing value in ConcurrentHashMap each time
Try to migrate from old Data to newer .time. library please

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -60,6 +60,7 @@ Following metrics are collected and submitted if account is configured with `det
 - `account.<account-id>.<bidder-name>.request_time` - timer tracking how long did it take to make a request to `<bidder-name>` when incoming request was from `<account-id>` 
 - `account.<account-id>.<bidder-name>.bids_received` - number of bids received from `<bidder-name>` when incoming request was from `<account-id>`
 - `account.<account-id>.<bidder-name>.requests.(gotbids|nobid)` - number of requests made to `<bidder-name>` broken down by result status  when incoming request was from `<account-id>`
+- `account.<account-id>.requests.rejected` - number of rejected requests caused by incorrect `accountId` ([UnauthorizedAccountException.java](https://github.com/rubicon-project/prebid-server-java/blob/master/src/main/java/org/prebid/server/exception/UnauthorizedAccountException.java))

nodes.bodyText: Pls add null check for logger argument.

Make this method private.
Add unit test for it.
Pls extract 5 to class constant, like LOG_PERIOD_SECONDS.
Pls extract 5 to class constant, like LOG_PERIOD_SECONDS.
Pls set reasonable name test, like infoShouldCallLoggerWithExpectedCount.
Pls use reasonable test data, like log message.
Pls extract 5 to class constant, like LOG_PERIOD_SECONDS.
Do we really need to compute value at each execution?
